title: Beneath The Frozen Sand
description: “Some stories have no heroes, only victims.”A young woman, Aisha, is found dead on a beach on the island of Zanzibar. The police have ruled her death a suicide. Why wouldn’t they? She had no injuries, and there were no signs of a struggle.But something is not right.Her body was cold as ice. The sand around her was frozen solid. She was found over 10 kilometers away from her home. She had just been accepted to a prestigious University in Europe.Why would she kill herself?When the parents of the deceased struggle to find answers to the mysterious death of their child, they hire Ibrahim Mubarak, a young private detective from mainland Tanzania, to find the truth.
author: Razaq Mzale
